title: Explaining a career change

dialogs.description: Explaining a career change to parents

lines.speaker: Child
lines.text: Mom, Dad, I need to talk to you about my job

lines.speaker: Parent
lines.text: What's going on? Is everything okay?

lines.speaker: Child
lines.text: I've decided to leave my job to pursue my passion

lines.speaker: Parent
lines.text: What? Why? You had a good job

lines.speaker: Child
lines.text: I know, but I wasn't happy and I want to try something new

lines.speaker: Parent
lines.text: We just want you to be happy, but are you sure this is the right decision?

lines.speaker: Child
lines.text: Yes, I'm positive. I've thought this through and I'm excited for the new opportunity

dialogs.description: Explaining a career change to parents with a positive tone

lines.speaker: Child
lines.text: Mom, Dad, I have some exciting news to share with you

lines.speaker: Parent
lines.text: What is it? You seem happy

lines.speaker: Child
lines.text: I've decided to leave my job to pursue my passion and I'm really excited about it

lines.speaker: Parent
lines.text: That's great! We're happy to see you happy. What made you decide to make this change?

lines.speaker: Child
lines.text: I realized that I wasn't fulfilled in my current job and I want to try something new that aligns with my goals

lines.speaker: Parent
lines.text: We support you and want you to be happy. What can we do to help?

lines.speaker: Child
lines.text: Just being supportive means a lot to me. I'm looking forward to this new chapter
